ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Won"),ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost"), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Cancelled")), RecordType.DeveloperName='NSSales_609_1', ISCHANGED(NSSales_609_1_SwitchIdentificationNumber__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot edit this field after the Opportunity is closed.
